thread.title: Watch Julian Edelman put a Cowboys defensive back on roller skates - Patriots
thread.title_full: Watch Julian Edelman put a Cowboys defensive back on roller skates - Patriots

author: boston.com
title: Watch Julian Edelman put a Cowboys defensive back on roller skates - Patriots
text:
Have a seat, Morris Claiborne.
Patriots wide receiver Julian Edelman, a former seventh-round draft pick , embarrassed the Cowboys’ cornerback, a former first-round pick, on a 1st-and-10 play in the second quarter during the Patriots’ Week 5 matchup against the Cowboys. Edelman made a juke at the line, left Claiborne in a pile on the ground, and then made an easy catch for 16 yards.
 It looks like it's just a Julian Edelman 16-yard catch. But the MOVE he put on Mo Claiborne?? No words. #NEvsDAL http://t.co/azcOK2UGtx
— NFL (@NFL) October 11, 2015 Edelman finished the first half with three receptions for 61 yards, which was better than the entire Cowboys offense, which totalled 59.
